GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
orangefs: Fix sysfs not cleanup when dev init failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 36ffa81608ce21a52394263cd3c51e1b604c6f30, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 2f83ace37181e445cab83d1d2a3a1dc88a36a814. For more details please see the references link.
